table.name: vtiger_natureofchanges
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_natureofchanges` ( `natureofchangesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `nature_of_changes_no` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `full_name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`natureofchangesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_natureofchangescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_natureofchangescf` ( `natureofchangesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`natureofchangesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
